name: NSPageLayout
desc: A panel that queries the user for information such as paper type and orientation.

items.name: func beginSheet(with: NSPrintInfo, modalFor: NSWindow, delegate: Any?, didEnd: Selector?, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
items.desc: Presents a page setup sheet for the specified print info object, document-modal relative to the specified window.

items.name: func runModal() -> Int
items.desc: Displays the page layout panel and begins the modal loop using the shared print info object.

items.name: func runModal(with: NSPrintInfo) -> Int
items.desc: Displays the page layout panel and begins the modal loop using the specified print info object.

items.name: func addAccessoryController(NSViewController)
items.desc: Adds the specified controller of an accessory view to be presented in the page setup panel.

items.name: func removeAccessoryController(NSViewController)
items.desc: Removes the specified controller of an accessory view.

items.name: var accessoryControllers: [NSViewController]
items.desc: An array of accessory view controllers belonging to the page layout panel.

items.name: var printInfo: NSPrintInfo?
items.desc: The printing information object used when the page layout panel is run.
